launcher module¶

platform

“Linux”

launcher.DISPLAY_MIN = 200¶
Type

int

launcher.SNAKE_MIN = 10¶
Type

int

launcher.btn_play_click()¶

The handler of btn_play click

launcher.dh = 200¶
Type

int

launcher.dw = 200¶
Type

int

launcher.frame1 = <tkinter.Frame object .!frame>¶

The label “Welcome to the “Snake” game!”

launcher.main()¶
launcher.setting_frame = <tkinter.Frame object .!frame2>¶

The label “Display width”

launcher.start(event)¶

Start ‘btn_play_click’ with some event.

eventobject

event is some event. For exaple: if ‘Enter’ key is pressed,

then event will be ‘<Return>’.

launcher.start_game(dw, dh, sw, ss)¶

Start the game.

dw, dh, sw, ssint

The width, the height of display and the width, the speed of snake.

launcher.sw = 20¶
Type

int
